response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This product offers unparalleled performance, efficiency, and durability, making it an invaluable asset for anyone seeking excellence in their field. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it provides, we are offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $15,000. This is an opportunity not only to acquire a top-tier product but also to secure a significant value compared to the market price. We believe that with its capabilities, this investment will pay off handsomely for you in the long run. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you with our premium product.", "product_price": 15000}
